definition: A number is added 9, divided by 3, subtracted 2, and multiplied by 4 to give an answer of 8. What was the starting number?
An even number and an odd number are multiplied together, added 6, divided by 5, and subtracted 3 to give an answer of 1. What was the odd number?
What number is one half of one tenth of one quarter of 400?
If the day after tomorrow is five days after Sunday then what day is it today?
Given 1, 3, 7, 15, 31. What is the next number in the sequence?
